text:
FRANK RUSHTON, JR.
p. o. box 385
FORT RUCKER, ALABAMA 36360
26 July 1966
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue N. W.
Washington, D. C.
Dear Sirs:
With the opening of the U. S. Army Aviation School closed-circuit
television system, several NAEB members have been added to our staff.
Current travel restrictions prevent participation in national NAEB conÂ¬
ferences and conventions, but the Regional Division of NAEB, covering
the Southeastern United States , appears to be a practical solution to our
desire to participate in professional meetings and seminars.
Would you please send a list of the officers and their addresses for
